name: purescript-concur-react
description: Concur UI framework for Purescript, React backend

scripts.dev: cd examples && rimraf temp && spago build && parcel build --public-url ./ index.html
scripts.prod: cd examples && rimraf temp && mkdir temp && spago build -- -g corefn && ../zephyr -f Main.main && rm -rf output && mv dce-output output && spago bundle-app --no-build --to temp/index.prod.js && java -jar ../closure-compiler/closure-compiler-v20190301.jar --js temp/index.prod.js --js_output_file temp/index.prod.minified.js && cp index.prod.html temp && parcel build --public-url ./ temp/index.prod.html && mv dist/index.prod.html dist/index.html && rimraf temp
scripts.prod1: cd examples && rimraf temp && mkdir temp && spago bundle-app --to temp/index.prod.js && java -jar ../closure-compiler/closure-compiler-v20190301.jar --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --js temp/index.prod.js --js_output_file temp/index.prod.minified.js && cp index.prod.html temp && parcel build --public-url ./ temp/index.prod.html && mv dist/index.prod.html dist/index.html && rimraf temp
scripts.docs: npm run prod && cp docs/logo.png dist && cp docs/Purescript-Concur-Performance.png dist && rimraf docs && mv dist docs
